attributes.action: Prosecute all MPs who fiddled the system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The normal working man/woman would end up in court if they fiddled either wilifully or in error, even for a small amount. We do not think MPs are better or above the law. And want all cases of abusing tax payers money to be dealt with in court.

rejection.details: The PM can not prosecute or instruct the police to prosecute an individual.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
